channel.title: Paper Reading - 标签 - Adbean's Blog
channel.description: Paper Reading - 标签 - Adbean's Blog

item.title: Paper Reading: Dune
item.author: Adbean
item.description: Dune: Safe User-level Access to Privileged CPU Features 是 MIT OS 课上的讲座，也是一篇很有意思的论文，很类似 exokernel，不过更像是内核上的功能，利用虚拟化使得进程可以访问一些内

item.title: Paper Reading: Exokernel
item.author: Adbean
item.description: Exokernel: An Operating System Architecture for Application-Level Resource Management 微内核？搜了一下发现上交的操作系统课甚至会讲这篇论文，但这篇论文也太早了 1995 年的，MIT 6828 (现 6.1810) 应该也会讲 Abstract operating system abstractions such as interprocess com- munication

item.title: Paper Reading: Scalability! But at what COST
item.author: Adbean
item.description: Scalability! But at what COST? 比较短的 paper，之前也略有看过，主要讲主流分布式框架在多机器上存在 COST(不是成本) 问题，并不一定能比单机更好。是很有意思的

item.title: Paper Reading: The Multikernel: A New OS Architecture for Scalable Multicore Systems
item.author: Adbean
item.description: The Multikernel: A New OS Architecture for Scalable Multicore Systems SOSP 09 的文章，提出了 MultiKernel 分布式系统，网络架构是如何做通信、消息传递的。 ABSTRACT 商用计算机越来越多的 processor cores 和多样化的架构，内存、互联 、

item.title: Paper Reading: DuckDB: an Embeddable Analytical Database
item.author: Adbean
item.description: DuckDB: an Embeddable Analytical Database 读一下 DuckDB 的论文，对 OLAP 没什么了解，但论文很短也可以看看。 ABSTRACT SQLite 应用很广，unobtrusive in-process data management 是有必要的，但目前没有系统做 这样的

item.title: Paper Reading: CatSQL: Towards Real World Natural Language to SQL Applications [VLDB 23]
item.author: Adbean
item.description: CatSQL: Towards Real World Natural Language to SQL Applications NL2SQL, text to SQL 是很有趣的方向。有 DL 方法也有现在的 LLM 微调。 ABSTRACT rule-based 或者 Deep Learning 方法，要么无法通用，或者存在语法/语义错误/无法执行。 本文提

item.title: Paper Reading: The Case for a Learned Sorting Algorithm [SIGMOD 2020]
item.author: Adbean
item.description: The Case for a Learned Sorting Algorithm 除了 Query Optimization, Index, Tunning, ML 还可以用在 Database 其他方面，比如排序？ 论文作者中的 Tim Kraska 以及其团队，是 SageDB, Bao: Learned Query Optimization, Neo 的作者，此外还有 FITing-Tree 索引结构。 看了一下 Tim

item.title: Paper Reading: An Inquiry into Machine Learning-based Automatic Configuration Tuning Services on Real-World Database Management Systems
item.author: Adbean
item.description: An Inquiry into Machine Learning-based Automatic Configuration Tuning Services on Real-World Database Management Systems CMU 的对于 DBMS 自动调优的论文，采用了 ML 机器学习方法，是 Ottertune 的论文。 ABSTRACT Modern database management systems (DBMS) expose dozens of configurable knobs that control their runtime behavior 与专家 DBA 相比，使用机

item.title: Paper Reading: MB2: Decomposed Behavior Modeling for Self-Driving Database Management Systems
item.author: Adbean
item.description: MB2: Decomposed Behavior Modeling for Self-Driving Database Management Systems self-driving database management systems ABSTRACT Database management systems (DBMSs) are notoriously difficult to deploy and administer.self-driving DBMS is to remove these impediments by managing itself automatically predict the DBMS’s runtime behavior and resource consumption. ModelBot2 e2e framework for constructing and maintaining prediction models using machine learning (ML) in self-driving DBMSs. decomposes a DBMS

item.title: Paper Reading: Bao: Making Learned Query Optimization Practical [SIGMOD 21]
item.author: Adbean
item.description: Bao: Making Learned Query Optimization Practical MLDB + query optimization ABSTRACT 最近 ML 做 query optimization 由于需要 substantive training overhead 所以其实很少 practical gains, inability to adapt to changes, poor tail performance. 论文提出了 Bao, Bandit Optimizer, 通过利用现有查询优化器的知识，对每个查询提供
